card.title: Welcome to encodeBiz SaaS
card.subtitle: Register, control and manage access in one place, CheckBiz and PassBiz ready for you.

cardDesc.title: More than software, your digital development partner
cardDesc.subtitle1: At Encodebiz we create custom solutions for unique needs.
cardDesc.subtitle2: If your company requires specialized development, we are ready to make it happen.

card.title: Create legal entity
card.subtitle: On the platform you can associate multiple entities with the account, but at least one is needed to start using our products

salesPlan.title: AVAILABLE PLANS
salesPlan.subTitle: Choose between the Free, Basic or Advanced version depending on the features you need. Upgrade or change your plan at any time to enhance your PassBiz experience.
salesPlan.branding: Branding: EncodeBiz default logo and design
salesPlan.costEstimated: Estimated cost: Variable based on usage
salesPlan.estimateRangeCustom: Estimated margin: Variable, but with potential to be significant
salesPlan.priceMonthly: Monthly Price: To be agreed (recommended between €99 and €499)
salesPlan.modelCustom: Model: Customized according to customer needs
salesPlan.imageConfirmModalTitle2: To make a subscription, you must first configure the following data in the entity:
salesPlan.notAllowedPlan: You must update the legal data of the selected entity before getting a plan.
